    • switchScene

      public static void switchScene​(String path, Class controller, javafx.stage.Stage stage, javafx.scene.control.TextArea error)
      Switch from the current scene to the new one passed in using new FXMLLoader
      Parameters:
      path - the path to the new scene .fxml file
      controller - the current controller
      stage - the current stage
      error - the area to output error messages for the user.
